item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Not at all. Haha. Her books are great for introductory concepts to basic principles in go. Anything in regards to style is pretty much absent from it. The only way to really show you this properly is through a game record. Remind me via email later and I'll send you a kifu of one I played recently.
item.content:encoded:
Not at all. Haha. Her books are great for introductory concepts to basic principles in go. Anything in regards to style is pretty much absent from it.
The only way to really show you this properly is through a game record. Remind me via email later and I’ll send you a kifu of one I played recently.

item.title: By: Marek Jasovsky
item.dc:creator: Marek Jasovsky
item.description: Well question is simple. İs this book ok for the korean "invade, fight, invade, fight fight fight" style you mentioned to me recently? Are the books suitable in this regard? İ started to go through them recently... Thx
item.content:encoded: Well question is simple. İs this book ok for the korean “invade, fight, invade, fight fight fight” style you mentioned to me recently? Are the books suitable in this regard? İ started to go through them recently… Thx

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Good question! I actually do own her entire series and have read them, but have not officially reviewed them. I'll be sure to add it on my list of things to do. Let me know if you have any specific questions about them though and I'll be happy to answer them!
item.content:encoded: Good question! I actually do own her entire series and have read them, but have not officially reviewed them. I’ll be sure to add it on my list of things to do. Let me know if you have any specific questions about them though and I’ll be happy to answer them!

item.title: By: Marek Jasovsky

item.description: Hi What about Janice Kim and her series? Learn to play go in 5 volumes?
item.content:encoded:

What about Janice Kim and her series? Learn to play go in 5 volumes?

item.title: By: Starting Slowly… « A Journey in Stones
item.dc:creator: Starting Slowly… « A Journey in Stones
item.description: […] I plan to take a little time to go back through the book before moving on. I also plan to start getting the Level Up! books, as I have heard good things about them. My Go buddy, Ben, has done reviews of these (and lots of others) here. […]
